# Shiny Dashboards{#dashboards}
Shiny dashboards are a combination of R flexdashboards and R Shiny. To use shiny dashboards, you will first need to install felxdashboard package

```{r, eval = F}
install.packages("flexdashboard")
library(flexdashboard)
```
